column3:
Example:

```
2019-07-26T20:11:22.049000Z TestFramework (INFO): Test a re-org of one week's worth of blocks (1088 blocks)
[...]
 node0 2019-07-26T20:14:44.224983Z [msghand] UpdateTip: new best=02a38b39fec53caf38302ad6075fb32f1f5dc52737ac36c60dbfbb11849038c4 height=766 version=0x00000004 log2_work=10.583083 tx=12824 date='2019-07-26T20:22:31Z' progress=1.000000 cache=1.6MiB(12000txo)
Could you explain why not assert here?
This is called in `add_p2p_connection`, which establishes the connection async. So the assert will fail on the first try.
